The tanzanite helm is obtained by using a tanzanite mutagen on a serpentine helm. The tanzanite helm retains the stats and abilities of the serpentine helm, the only difference being the appearance of the helmet. Like the regular helm, it cannot be equipped if it is uncharged, except when it fully degrades while being worn.

As of 14 May 2015, if a player dies with the tanzanite helm, it will keep their colour unless the player has succumbed to a player killer.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 February 2016
(update)

The uncharged helm can no longer be equipped.

14 May 2015
(update)
  • The Tanzanite helm now keeps its colour when dropped on death, unless you died to a PKer.
  • Fixed a labeling issue on the female uncharged tanzanite helm.

The '''tanzanite helm''' is obtained by using a [[tanzanite mutagen]] on a [[serpentine helm]]. The tanzanite helm retains the stats and abilities of the serpentine helm, the only difference being the appearance of the helmet. Like the regular helm, it cannot be equipped if it is uncharged, except when it fully degrades while being worn.

As of [[14 May]] [[2015]], if a player dies with the tanzanite helm, it will keep their colour unless the player has succumbed to a [[player killer]].
